overview: With moving stories from a range of characters from her Kahnawake Reserve, Mohawk filmmaker, Tracey Deer, reveals the divisive legacy of more than a hundred years of discriminatory and sexist government policy to expose the lingering "blood quantum" ideals, snobby attitudes and outright racism that threaten to destroy the fabric of her community.
tagline: A look at how women in the community of Kahnawake risk losing their right to live on the reserve after marrying non-natives.
title: Club Native
